name: Egg Coffee
description: A Hanoi specialty in which a creamy soft, meringue-like egg white foam is perched on dense Vietnamese coffee. Best served hot on a winter day
directions: Combine the egg yolks, 20 ml of condensed milk, sugar and the vanilla extract in a bowl, then whisk until frothy and fluffy
After brewing the coffee, pour in the rest of condensed milk, stir gently
Pour the egg on top of the coffee
Garnish with the cocoa powder on top
Serve the cup of coffee inside a bowl of hot water to keep the it warm
